All foreign service (and this has been my con- viction from the days of my youth) is obscurity and squalor for those whose active services at Rome can shine forth in splendour. And being so well assured of this, would that I had remained true to my creed! All the profits of a province are not to be compared, I swear it, with one single little stroll, and one single talk, with you.
